text:
Hi Everyone!

Quick question on something I hope one of you might now the answer to ... On our website , we have a "request a demo" HubSpot form. I am looking to make this form interactive on two aspects/properties:

1. Marketplace revenue; when high, show meeting link of round robin directly
2. Region; connect the right round robin of that region.

I have tried using a two step form that saves the first answers as a separate submission; and then using an interactive CTA to lead the visitor to either the meetinglink or the home page. However, the storing of the data and adjusting the CTA takes more than 20 seconds which is too long for my visitors.

Anyone who knows how I can embed the meetings tool based on the user's input? Or how I can make an interactive form like this?

Many thanks!

Reminder: Welcome to our developer community. If someone helps you out by answering a question. please pay it forward by helping someone else out in the community - when you know an answer. Ask questions in the relevant channels, our community is very active and will see it. We have a chatbot that can answer commonly asked questions, feel free to reach out to it by DMing `@DevHelp`
I think you could try building a custom form with something like vue/react to create all that custom logic, and in the end submit the form data using forms api
